document.full_text: in the sleepy town of wadowice in southern poland, they are sprucing up the main square and renovating the house where its most famous son, the late pope john paul ii, was born as karol wojtyla 91 years ago.
document.title: papal beatification stirs pride, hope in polish church
lines_and_colors: in the sleepy town of wadowice in southern poland, they are sprucing up the main square and renovating the house where its most famous son, the late pope john paul ii, was born as karol wojtyla 91 years ago.
